title: Delta Hedging
badge_description: You understand how professionals neutralize risk and profit from volatility

screens.headline: How do market makers profit without taking directional risk?
screens.text: Delta hedging is the secret sauce. They sell you options, hedge away the risk, and collect free money from time decay. Here's how.

screens.headline: Delta Hedging: Neutralizing Risk
screens.text: Delta hedging means adjusting your position so your total delta equals ZERO. When delta-neutral, stock movements don't affect you - you profit from time decay and volatility instead.

screens.headline: Like Betting Both Sides
screens.text: Imagine betting $100 on both teams in a game. You can't lose from the outcome, but you CAN profit if the bookie gives you better odds on one side. Delta hedging works the same - neutralize direction, profit from the 'spread.'

reveal_sections.label: Sell options = Negative delta (like betting Team A)
Buy stock = Positive delta (like betting Team B)
Net zero = Don't care who wins (delta neutral)
Profit from theta decay = The 'spread' you keep

screens.question: You sell 5 ATM calls with delta -0.50 each. What's your total delta?
options: -250 delta (need to buy 250 shares to hedge)
screens.explanation_correct: Perfect! 5 contracts √ó -0.50 delta √ó 100 shares = -250 delta. You'd need to BUY 250 shares (+250 delta) to become neutral.
screens.explanation_wrong: Calculate: 5 contracts √ó -0.50 delta √ó 100 shares/contract = -250 delta total. Each contract controls 100 shares!

screens.question: You sold 10 calls (-500 delta) and bought 500 shares (+500 delta). Stock rises $5. What happens to your P/L from the stock move?
options: Lose $2,500 (calls lost more than stock gained)
Gain $2,500 (stock gained more than calls lost)
screens.explanation_correct: Exactly! Delta neutral means stock direction doesn't matter. Calls lose ~$2,500, stock gains ~$2,500. Net ‚âà $0. You profit from THETA DECAY instead.
screens.explanation_wrong: Think it through: You're HEDGED. The -500 delta from calls is offset by +500 delta from stock. Movement cancels out!
